title: Is it really necessary to constantly upgrade our devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not at all. I do not think it is necessary to keep on upgrading our devices. First of all they are quite expensive. Second the new devices have very less new features than its predecessors. The primary reason why people upgrade device is to stay with the time and to stay at par with the latest technology. Mobile phones these days can serve one atlest 2–3 years. Laptops can serve from 4–5 years. Smart Watch, Smart TV etc are still in developing stages so it doesn't make any sense upgrading them.
